# AssociationOwner enumeration

This property defines whether an [`association`](./IAssociation.md) has one or two owners. If there is one owner, the owner is located at the start of the arrow.

```csharp
public enum AssociationOwner
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Default | `0` | Only one entity is the owner (the parent). |
| Both | `1` | Both entities are owners. |
